tasks.task_description: Implement real-time order tracking with live updates
Create advanced search with filters and voice search
Add personalization features (user preferences, order history)
Create loyalty program and rewards system
Add accessibility features and improved UX
Update dependencies and add new packages

description: Enhance FlavorFinder food delivery app with intelligent features, advanced functionalities, and improved UI/UX
context: Updated pubspec.yaml with comprehensive dependencies for AI/ML, real-time features, notifications, voice search, biometric auth, animations, maps, analytics, and more
Created AI-powered recommendation system with personalized food suggestions, user preference learning, and similarity-based recommendations
Implemented comprehensive real-time order tracking system with WebSocket support, live map integration, status timeline, and driver information
Created comprehensive advanced search system with voice search, intelligent filters, suggestions, trending searches, and real-time results
Created comprehensive personalization system with user profiles, preferences, order history tracking, favorites, and detailed user insights with analytics

Implemented comprehensive advanced animations and micro-interactions including splash screen, animated cards, floating elements, pulse animations, shimmer loading, custom page transitions, and haptic feedback throughout the app
Implemented comprehensive biometric authentication system with fingerprint/face ID support, security features, lockout protection, and user-friendly setup interface
Created comprehensive enhanced README documenting all intelligent features, advanced functionalities, and technical improvements implemented in the FlavorFinder app
